message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to you. I'm willing to let you have it for a very attractive price of $1000000. This is a significant discount from its true value.  Let me know if you're interested and we can schedule a time to discuss it further.
